TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FontSize extends System.Enum

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

Docs.summary: Specifies the size of the rendered text. This class cannot be inherited. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontSize> enumeration is a subset of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize?displayProperty=fullName>, and represents the size of a font in a container. For example, if you have a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List> control inside of a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Panel> control, with the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Panel> control's font size set to Normal, you can specify a small font size for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List> control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontSize Large = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Font is larger than . This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

Docs.summary: Default font size. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontSize NotSet = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Default value. If the value is , then the font's size is inherited from the control's style, or, if the style is not defined, from the control's parent control. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
